NewsArticle.Title: Reset Notes
NewsArticle.Content: Pig Chase * Removing the "maze" from the Lover's Maze Garden * Male and Female Pigs are easier to catch Experience/Ability * Removing the 25% Bonus EXP/AB Double Bonus Experience/Ability * November 26-30th, players will receive Bonus Experience/Ability gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc. (Thanksgiving weekend)
